Segment.name: M11
Segment.comment: To transmit bill of lading detail information for a manifest

Field.name: BillOfLadingWaybillNumber1
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the carrier or consolidator

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: ManifestUnitCode
Field.comment: Code defining the smallest package unit for the bill of lading

Field.name: BillOfLadingTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of bill of lading

Field.name: PlaceOfReceiptByPreCarrier
Field.comment: The city or country in which the pre-carrier took possession of the cargo

Field.name: BillOfLadingWaybillNumber2
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the carrier or consolidator

Field.name: ShippersExportDeclarationRequirements
Field.comment: Code identifying which Shipper's Export Declaration (SED) requirements are being met

Field.name: ExportExceptionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying why a Shipper's Export Declaration (SED) is not required

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1103 or M1104 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1105 or M1106 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1107 or M1108 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1113
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M1111 or M1113 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1514
SyntaxNote.comment: If M1115 is present, then M1114 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1815
SyntaxNote.comment: If M1118 is present, then M1115 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1918
SyntaxNote.comment: If M1119 is present, then M1118 is required.
